item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, May 28, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Sunak unveils £2.4bn pensioner tax cut in bid to stabilise election campaign
2. Israel faces wave of condemnation over strike on Rafah camp
3. Jet-setting Argentine President Javier Milei courts top US tech CEOs
4. [Opinion] America breaks global rules as it defends the free world
5. Toyota bets on new line of combustion engines in challenge to Tesla
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, May 28, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
